text.name: BANKMANAGEMENT_ADDMONEYTEXT
text.text: Select the desired amount of money:

text.name: BANKMANAGEMENT_NOFARM
text.text: You do not have sufficient permissions on this farm!

text.name: BANKMANAGEMENT_AMOUNTTEXT_TOOLTIP
text.text: This is your actual account balance.

text.name: BANKMANAGEMENT_EQUITYTEXT_TOOLTIP
text.text: This is your calculated own capital.

text.name: BANKMANAGEMENT_EQUITYLOANRATIOTEXT_TOOLTIP
text.text: value shows your current equity loan ratio (%).

text.name: BANKMANAGEMENT_LOANINTERESTRATETEXT_TOOLTIP
text.text: Your current loan interest rate per ingame day (%).

text.name: BANKMANAGEMENT_CREDITAMOUNTCHANGETEXT_TOOLTIP
text.text: Adjust account balance in case of credit change.
